xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="hostNoDomain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains("${host name}", ".")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before("${host name}", ".")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${host name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="serviceName"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains('${service name}', '@')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before('${service name}', '@')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${service name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="service"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host]/services/service/@name = $serviceName"> <xsl:value-of select="$serviceName" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <commands> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ])"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service])"> <xsl:call-template name="Start"> <xsl:with-param name="commandStr" select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name =$host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/start/command/text()" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:call-template name="Stop"> <xsl:with-param name="commandStr" select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name =$host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/stop/command/text()" /> </xsl:call-template> <xsl:apply-templates select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/restart" mode="restart" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </commands> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="Start" mode="start" match="service"> <xsl:param name="commandStr" /> <start> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($commandStr, "SERVERNAME")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before($commandStr, "{SERVERNAME}"), $hostNoDomain, substring-after($commandStr, "{SERVERNAME}"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$commandStr" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </start> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="Stop" mode="stop" match="service"> <xsl:param name="commandStr" /> <stop> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($commandStr, "SERVERNAME")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before($commandStr, "{SERVERNAME}"), $hostNoDomain, substring-after($commandStr, "{SERVERNAME}"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$commandStr" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </stop> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="Restart" mode="restart" match="restart"> <restart> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="count(command) = 1"> <xsl:value-of select="command/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <stop> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(commands/command[1]/text(), "SERVERNAME")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before(commands/command[1]/text(), "{SERVERNAME}"), $hostNoDomain, substring-after(commands/command[1]/text(), "{SERVERNAME}"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="commands/command[1]/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </stop> <start> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(commands/command[2]/text(), "SERVERNAME")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before(commands/command[2]/text(), "{SERVERNAME}"), $hostNoDomain, substring-after(commands/command[2]/text(), "{SERVERNAME}"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="commands/command[2]/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </start> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </restart> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}']/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="service"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}']/services/service/@name = '${service name}'">${service name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <validation> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host]/services/service[@name = $service]/validation/*" /> </validation> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="pre-command"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length("${logfile}") > 0"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=""${os type}" = "windows""> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">move "${logfile}" "${logfile}_${tag}" & </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">mv "${logfile}" "${logfile}_${tag}" ; </xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//start"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:element name="{$nodeName}"> <xsl:value-of select="concat($pre-command, string(//start/text()))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
Create commands for service start, stop and restart. Output format will be:
<commands> <start/> <stop /> <restart /> </commands>
